name: King's Knight: Wrath of the Dark Dragon
storyline: Princess Claire of Olthea has been kidnapped by the evil dragon Tolfidan and spirited away to Gargatua Castle deep within the fallen kingdom of Izander. Four chosen heroes set forth to rescue the princess, and after a long, perilous journey, arrive in the hall of the ancient stronghold.
summary: King's Knight: Wrath of the Dark Dragon is a tap-battle RPG with high quality graphics, voice overs, and sound design. It is a Japanese "gacha" style game, meaning it allows players to earn semi-random items, equipment sets, and characters to use throughout the game. Wrath of the Dark Dragon is the latest in the storied King's Knight series, set 50 years after the events of the first game.
